error.title: Error
error.freeModelNote: Note: Free models have very strict rate limits due to high demand.
error.modelNotAvailable: Selected model is not available. The model may have been removed or is temporarily unavailable.
error.resourceNotFound: Resource not found. Please try a different chain or pair.
error.invalidRequest: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again.
error.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
error.authError: Invalid {{service}} API key. Please check your settings.
error.timeout: Request timed out during {{service}}. Please try again.
error.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
error.unknownError: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

suggestion.freeModelLimits: Free models have very strict rate limits
suggestion.usePaidModel: Consider using a paid model for reliable performance
suggestion.tryLater: Try again in a few minutes when usage decreases
suggestion.tryDifferentModel: Consider using a less demanding model
suggestion.tryDifferentChain: Try selecting a different chain or model
suggestion.refreshExtension: Refresh the extension and try again
suggestion.checkDeprecated: Check if the model is deprecated on OpenRouter
suggestion.tryFasterModel: Try a faster model (e.g., Claude Haiku instead of Sonnet)
suggestion.checkConsole: Check the browser console for details
suggestion.goToSettings: Click the extension icon and go to Settings
suggestion.verifyApiKey: Verify your {{service}} API key is correct
suggestion.getNewKey: Get a new API key from {{url}}
suggestion.checkServiceStatus: Check if the service is experiencing issues

results.disclaimer: Data is provided for informational purposes only.
results.dyor: Always DYOR before making any investment decisions.
